name: Monopoly Madness
overview: Rediscover the property trading game you love in a way you’ve never seen before. Mr. MONOPOLY is looking for a temporary stand-in while he takes vacation! Get ready to engage in a real-time competitive race to see who has what it takes to take Mr. Monopoly's place. In this race for fame and fortune, the rules have changed slightly: • No more board! Roam the streets of Monopoly Town to collect money, water, and electricity. • 20 NEW playable characters inspired by classic MONOPOLY® tokens. • Discover 4 unique environments, each with several levels and layouts. • Play with up to 6 players online or locally. • Get power-ups from the Community Chests! Use them to mess with your opponents and gain an advantage to win. This is Madness!
